Starstomp arrived in the cr chamber. Two pods were attached on a wall, 
a third one lied on the floor. The three of them showed that the 
sparks they contained were now extinguished...

Starstomp: Hey, Aero, you want to call technical back-up? Anyways, I 
found three pods, but their occupants are... well... they're dead... 
Let the matrix grant them freedom... I'll continue checking here...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      Using the map he went to the engine room.  "Wow this is a 
mess."  He looks around at the dangling cables and components.  "I 
wish Grounded or Obfucious were here.  They'd be better at this than 
me."  He starts reattaching things where he thinks they should be.
